root: ^I'm not sure if that creature over there is cute or not.... it kinda depends on whether the thing on its face is an eye or a void.. what do you think?

c-0: ^I think I wanna call it Bean.
^Bean.. isn't that a nature realm thing?
^Oh, is it? I thought it was a random word I had made up - you know like phub or wabbiejam or peace.
^Well.. I do not care much for the grassheads over there I admit, but I do admire their naming skills at least.
^Haha, sure it is. Next you're gonna tell me the delicious prune porridge we eat is actually made of cockroaches.
c-1: ^But that doesn't mean it's not cute. Creatures with a void as their face can be cute.
^I think I wanna call it Bean.
^Bean.. isn't that a nature realm thing?
^Oh, is it? I thought it was a random word I had made up, you know like phub or wabbiejam or peace.
^Well.. I do not care much for the grassheads over there I admit, but I do admire their naming skills at least.
^Haha sure it is. Next you're gonna tell me the delicious prune porridge we eat is actually made of cockroaches.
